title: BLANK_VALUE
description: Returns a substitute value if the provided value is blank or empty; otherwise, returns the original value.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The object or value to evaluate.

parameters.name: substitute_value
parameters.description: The value to return if obj is blank.

examples:
BLANK_VALUE(Rating, "No Data")
-- Returns 'No Data' if Rating is NULL or blank; otherwise, returns the value of Rating.
